data.title: PRESSMART MEDIA LIMITED
data.meta_description: PRESSMART MEDIA LIMITED is the legal entity of Pressmart.
data.text:
Associated Brands: Pressmart

About PRESSMART MEDIA LIMITED

PRESSMART MEDIA LIMITED is a Public Limited Company and was incorporated on Aug 30, 2006 in India. Its corporate identification number is (CIN) U74300TG2006PLC051031 and its current status is Active.
